channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: NFL Second, Third Helmet Concept Series – AFC East
item.description: Our newest concept series creates second and/or third helmet designs for every NFL team, starting with the AFC East.

item.title: Gayle King Defends Justin Timberlake After DWI, Says He Isn't Irresponsible
item.description: Gayle King's sticking up for Justin Timberlake ... saying he's a responsible, upstanding dude who just made a one-off bad decision when he allegedly chose to drink and drive. The newscaster gave her take on "CBS Mornings" Wednesday after a segment…

item.title: An Apparent Leak of the New Anaheim Ducks Uniforms & Logo?
item.description: Just one day after the Anaheim Ducks dropped a tantalizing teaser, an eager Reddit user may have spoiled the party. Thanks to a few dozen folks sending me messages, we learned that earlier today, Reddit user The_Illa_Vanilla posted an image to the Reddit/Hockey boards purportedly showing the new Anaheim Ducks

item.title: Simone Biles Breaks Down In Tears Over Tokyo Olympics Struggles In Doc Trailer
item.description: Simone Biles is pulling back the curtains on the personal struggles she experienced during the 2020 Olympics ... sharing footage of herself breaking down in tears as she discussed her mental health as part of an upcoming documentary. Netflix just…

item.title: Baltimore Ravens Add New Purple and Gold Helmet
item.description: Purple will reign in Baltimore this fall. The Baltimore Ravens just announced their new alternate ‘Purple Rising’ helmet, to be worn for one game this upcoming season. The shell is purple, with two gold stripes going down the middle and a gold facemask. The team’s wordmark is on the front

item.title: Justin Timberlake Warned Miami Crowd 'Be Careful Out There' Before DWI Bust
item.description: Justin Timberlake had sage advice for one of his concert crowds just two nights before his DWI arrest ... and his words of wisdom could have come in handy for himself in Sag Harbor. TMZ obtained video from Justin's Saturday tour stop in Miami,…

item.title: Anaheim Ducks Drop a Mighty Good Teaser
item.description: The Anaheim Ducks today posted a teaser graphic that teases a potential new Mighty Ducks of Anaheim themed uniform. Posted to their various social media channels, the teaser shows a closeup of the eye of the mask from the club’s original Mighty Ducks logo but with some subtle modernizations. Unfortunately,

item.title: Louisiana to Require Ten Commandments Posters in Classrooms
item.description: Louisiana's getting back to basics in its education system, 'cause a new law requiring schools to display some of the oldest written rules in every class just kicked in ... and holy cow! The new law demands a poster-sized display of the Biblical…

item.title: Uruguay Launches First Home and Away Kits Under New Nike Deal
item.description: Kits are not yet available for retail purchase; AUF warns that any shirts out there are fakes and they will take "necessary legal action" against counterfeiters

item.title: Justin Timberlake DWI Arrest Sparks the Fury of Mothers Against Drunk Driving
item.description: Justin Timberlake has a prime opportunity to save lives in the wake of his arrest, but only if he's willing to own up to the alleged DWI ... so says Mothers Against Drunk Driving. Stacey D. Stewart, CEO of MADD, tells TMZ that JT is seriously lucky…
